comment: xenophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments.
amr:
# ::snt xenophobic slurs are offensive and hurtful and should not be used. Please refrain from these types of comments.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (o / offend-01
                  :ARG0 (s / slur
                        :mod (x / xenophobia)))
            :op2 (h / hurt-01
                  :ARG0 s)
            :op3 (r / recommend-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 s)))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / comment-01
                  :mod (t / type
                        :mod (t2 / this)))))
